```{r}
octo <- coral[coral$ScientificName == "Octocorallia", ]
```

```{r}
head(octo)
```

```{r}
octo_sf <- st_as_sf(
  octo,
  coords = c("longitude..degrees_east.", "latitude..degrees_north."),   # <â€” long first, lat second
  crs = 4326
)
```

```{r}
#map of octocoral

hawaii_bounds <- c(-161.1, 18.85, -154.8, 22.25)

mapboxgl(bounds = hawaii_bounds) |>
  add_circle_layer(
    id = "octo_points",
    source = octo_sf,
    circle_color = "purple",
    circle_radius = 5
  )
```
